channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: The second-gen AirTags are a scatterbrain’s best friend
item.description: In a somewhat controversial Vergecast episode, I declared that AirTags are a superior product to iPads. The iPad lovers roasted me across social media. I have heard and respect their opinions. But, I'm sorry - the second-gen AirTag has only deepened my conviction that the humble, $29 item tracker is one of Apple's most helpful […]

item.title: La puce d’Intel pour les consoles portables prend du retard
item.description: Alors que sur le marché des consoles portables PC, Intel semble rencontrer un obstacle de taille. Les très attendues puces Panther Lake, censées propulser la prochaine génération de concurrentes au Steam Deck et à la ROG Ally, ne pointeraient pas le bout de leur nez avant le printemps 2026.

item.title: Crime 101 writer-director Bart Layton reveals his Mount Rushmore of crime genre movies: 'they're endlessly brilliant and rewatchable'
item.description: Bart Layton lifts the lid on his all-time favorite crime movies – and how they inspired his new Chris Hemsworth-starring film.

item.title: J’ai testé un SSD qui ne fonctionne pas sans mon smartphone
item.description: Lexar a lancé un disque dur compact qui ne fonctionne que si vous approchez votre téléphone pour le déverrouiller par NFC. Voici notre test complet du TouchLock Portable SSD.

item.title: Anker’s new charger with a screen would feel less gimmicky if it did more
item.description: The latest Anker 45-watt Nano charger, announced in January, which remains one of the smallest 45-watt chargers on the market, adds a full color screen displaying an animated character and a smattering of details about the device you're charging. The display is occasionally useful if you like to keep tabs on how much power your […]

item.title: Why agentic AI and unified commerce will define ecommerce in 2026
item.description: How agentic AI and unified commerce unlock scalable, reliable ecommerce performance in 2026.

item.title: Quordle hints and answers for Sunday, February 8 (game #1476)
item.description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

item.title: NYT Connections hints and answers for Sunday, February 8 (game #973)
item.description: Looking for NYT Connections answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, plus my commentary on the puzzles.

item.title: NYT Strands hints and answers for Sunday, February 8 (game #707)
item.description: Looking for NYT Strands answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, including the spangram.

item.title: Windows 11 : attention, votre vieille imprimante pourrait cesser de fonctionner dès 2026
item.description: Microsoft fait le ménage dans Windows 11 et s'attaque aux pilotes d'imprimantes obsolètes. À partir de janvier 2026, l'OS cessera de supporter certaines versions dites « héritées », ce qui pourrait rendre inutilisables les modèles les plus anciens.

item.title: Anthropic joins a long list of brands that have vowed to stay ad-free. They don’t always keep their word
item.description: From streaming services to social media, the world is littered with once-safe spaces that have succumbed to advertising creep. Must AI go the same route? Forget about the big game on Sunday. Two heavyweights have been battling it out this week over a topic that’s become all-too-familiar over the years: advertising creep.

item.title: Ces deux smartphones pliants ultra premium deviennent enfin accessibles : mais entre Samsung et Motorola, lequel est fait pour vous ?
item.description: Envie de passer au smartphone pliant sans exploser le budget ? Le Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 7 et le Motorola Razr 60 Ultra, tous deux notés 8/10 sur Frandroid, s’affichent actuellement en promo autour de 800-900 euros. Deux excellentes références au format clapet, mais lequel est fait pour vous ?

item.title: Your local shopping mall could be about to get a major overhaul - LG reveals next-gen displays and screens coming to a store near you, including both ultra-high definition and a paper-thin display
item.description: LG shows how centralized software and modular displays could control how shopping centers deploy and manage digital signage.

item.title: Target Darts Omni Auto Scoring System Hits the Mark
item.description: Step up to the oche and hit the bull’s-eye with this automatic darts scoring system for online play.

item.title: Cairn is a climbing journey about perseverance and obsession
item.description: I'm an awful rock climber. Being scared of heights probably doesn't help. But when I've tried it, I've loved the slow, methodical work of moving from one ledge to the next. It reminds me a lot of why I love running; in both sports, you achieve goals that seem insurmountable by taking them one step […]

item.title: I tried a running watch for a month after years of running without one – here are 5 things I've learned
item.description: I swapped my phone for a running watch for a month to track my activities – here are 5 key differences for novices

item.title: AT&T is taking the fight to Verizon and T-Mobile with the strongest pair of iPhone deals I've seen at the carrier yet
item.description: These two deals are unusually good at AT&T right now

item.title: How to stream the 2026 Super Bowl for free this weekend: Patriots vs. Seahawks time, where to watch and more
item.description:
The 2026 Super Bowl between the New England Patriots and the Seattle Seahawks will air on NBC this Sunday, Feb. 8. The game will also stream on Peacock. If you don't have NBC over the air and don't subscribe to Peacock, there are still ways to watch Super Bowl LX — and Bad Bunny's history-making Halftime Show — for free. Here's how to tune in. How to watch Super Bowl LX free:
Date: Sunday, Feb. 8 Time: 6:30 p.m. ET Location: Levi's Stadium in Santa Clara, Calif. TV channel: NBC, Telemundo Streaming: Peacock, DirecTV, NFL+ and more 2026 Super Bowl game channel Super Bowl LX will air on NBC...
